{"id":1526977157,"question_id":694,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 days, 13 hours","timestamp":1738380167,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1526977157/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of Distinct Islands","memory":"33.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\nvector<vector<int>> grid;\nvector<vector<bool>> visited;\nstring curIsland;\npublic:\n    int numDistinctIslands(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        this->grid = grid;\n        int m = grid.size();\n        int n = grid[0].size();\n        visited = vector<vector<bool>>(m, vector<bool>(n, false));\n        unordered_set<string> islands;\n        for(int r=0; r<m; r++) {\n            for(int c=0; c<n; c++) {\n                curIsland = \"\";\n                dfs(r, c, '0');\n                if(curIsland.length()==0)\n                    continue;\n                islands.insert(curIsland);\n            }\n        }\n        return islands.size();\n    }\n    void dfs(int r, int c, char dir) {\n        if(r<0 || c<0 || r>=grid.size() || c >=grid[0].size() || visited[r][c] || grid[r][c]==0)\n            return;\n        visited[r][c] = true;\n        curIsland += dir;\n        dfs(r+1, c, 'D');\n        dfs(r-1, c, 'U');\n        dfs(r, c+1, 'R');\n        dfs(r, c-1, 'L');\n        curIsland += '0';\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-distinct-islands","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
